mapper.insert: insert into comment(member_id, board_id, content, parent_comment_id, created_date) values (#{memberId}, #{boardId}, #{content}, #{parentCommentId}, #{createdDate})
mapper.select: select c.comment_id, c.parent_comment_id, c.content, c.created_date, c.modified_date, m.nick_name from comment c join member m on m.member_id = c.member_id where c.board_id = #{boardId} and c.parent_comment_id is null order by c.created_date desc limit #{size} offset #{page};
